level 1.name: Level 1

answers:
McDonald's is a well-known company that 
 serves fast food and operates globally.

 annual events for local communities.

I work at a software company that 
 develops mobile applications.

level 1.question:
Why do you think working in

answers:
I think problem-solving skills

Employers should encourage their employees

level 2.name: Level 1
level 2.question:
What is the main challenge
you face in your job?
answers:
Communicating in different languages
with my clients is a constant
struggle for me.

Commuting becomes a daily problem
as I spend more time in my car
than in the office.

Prioritizing tasks and setting deadlines
to manage my time appropriately
is really difficult for me.

level 2.question:
How has your role in the

answers:
My responsibilities have been
consistent since the my first
day working here.

I'm now working part-time instead
of full-time as I needed to
finish my studies.

At the beginning I was in an
entry-level position, but now I am
working as a manager.

level 2.question:

I enjoy the routine of my daily

How my colleagues inspire me

level 2.question:

answers:
I try to stay organized and take

Talking to my friends and family

Mindfulness and exercising have

Creativity and innovation are
